videos.alt_text: adidas - Your Future Is Not Mine
videos.title: adidas - Your Future Is Not Mine (2016)
videos.description: The 2016 Adidas commercial "Your Future is Not Mine," directed by Terence Neale, features influential creatives like Aleali May, Luka Sabbat, and Iman Shumpert, among others, who march confidently towards an optimistic future, challenging the preconceived notions of a dystopian tomorrow. This campaign, produced by the advertising agency Johannes Leonardo, emphasizes individual empowerment and the message that one's future is theirs to create, rallying viewers to defy negative expectations and shape their own destinies through creativity and personal initiative.
videos.director: Exile Edit, Nate Gross, Shane Reid
videos.additional_info:
adidas - Your Future Is Not Mine (2016)

This campaign, produced by the advertising agency Johannes Leonardo, emphasizes individual empowerment and the message that one's future is theirs to create, rallying viewers to defy negative expectations and shape their own destinies through creativity and personal initiative.
Technique - Dystopian , Ground Level , Product , Product: Shoes
Director - Terence Neale
DOP - Sebastian Wintero

videos.title: The Gentlemen (TV Series) (2024)
videos.description: Season 1. Episode 6. Eddie Horniman inherits a family estate, initially unaware its home to a drug empire run by a syndicate that has no plans to vacate. In this episode, Eddie's doubts about Susie continue to grow. But there's 15 million pounds of dirty money to be laundered before she'll consider leaving the estate. Created by Guy Ritchie.

videos.title: Evil Dead Rise (2023)
videos.description: A twisted tale of two estranged sisters whose reunion is cut short by the rise of flesh-possessing demons, thrusting them into a primal battle for survival as they face the most nightmarish version of family imaginable. Stunning use of a split-diopter lens throughout the film. Shot breakdown: Dutch angle ground shot + split diopter lens + close up.

videos.title: 21 Savage - redrum (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "Redrum" by 21 Savage, featured on his album "American Dream," is directed by Danny Seth and showcases a return to the artist's roots in London. It contrasts iconic landmarks with the grittier areas of Brixton, symbolizing the song's themes. The track itself, produced by London on da Track, samples "Serenata do Adeus" and incorporates elements from "The Shining," including the famous line "Here's Johnny!" Despite some opinions that the video could have more directly referenced "The Shining's" iconic scenes, it has been well-received for its artistic representation and Savage's performance.
videos.additional_info:
21 Savage - redrum (2024)
The music video for "Redrum" by 21 Savage, featured on his album "American Dream," is directed by Danny Seth and showcases a return to the artist's roots in London. It contrasts iconic landmarks with the grittier areas of Brixton, symbolizing the song's themes. The track itself, produced by London on da Track, samples "Serenata do Adeus" and incorporates elements from "The Shining," including the famous line "Here's Johnny!" Despite some opinions that the video could have more directly referenced "The Shining's" iconic scenes, it has been well-received for its artistic representation and Savage's performance.
Technique - Ground Level , Profile
Director - Danny Seth
DOP - Chewy Lodge, JAWMIDNIGHT, Thomas Marchese
Editor - Anders Mills, Trim Editing
Colorist - Vlad Barin

videos.title: Blood Simple (1984)
videos.description: 1984 cult-classic movie directed by the Coen Brothers. In it, the owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies, and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered. You're seeing a locked-off ground-level shot. We say locked-off when the camera doesn't move. In this case, the character walks into frame and back out. A ground-level shot doesn't always signify the camera is literally on or near the ground, but that the camera on the lowest surface in the scene — in this case the bar counter.
videos.additional_info:
Blood Simple (1984)
1984 cult-classic movie directed by the Coen Brothers. In it, the owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies, and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered. You're seeing a locked-off ground-level shot. We say locked-off when the camera doesn't move. In this case, the character walks into frame and back out. A ground-level shot doesn't always signify the camera is literally on or near the ground, but that the camera on the lowest surface in the scene — in this case the bar counter.

videos.title: Flume feat. MAY-A - Say Nothing (2022)
videos.description: The music video for "Say Nothing" by Flume featuring MAY-A, directed by Michael Hili, offers a visually captivating and surreal experience. It includes psychedelic visuals, with Flume donning a bleach-blonde hairstyle and posing on motorcycles, while MAY-A is seen submerged in black sand. The video uses stark contrasts and vibrant colors to complement the song's themes of post-relationship clarity and emotional expression. This trippy and avant-garde style enhances the song's narrative, making it a standout piece in Flume's discography.
videos.additional_info:

videos.title: Majimbo - Aiza (2023)
videos.description: The music video for Aiza’s "Majimbo" showcases vibrant, energetic scenes that match the feel-good thumpy pop bassline and braggadocious flow of the song. Aiza, full of confidence, is seen walking down colorful city streets that transform into impromptu fashion runways, exuding an infectious joy and inner strength. K.O.G’s electric vocals elevate the video’s energy, capturing the pride and inspiration drawn from Elsa Majimbo’s rise to fame. The video blends Afropop, Afrobeat, and soulful R&B elements, celebrating Aiza’s journey and the empowerment of loving boldly.
videos.additional_info:

videos.title: Watchtower of Turkey (2014)
videos.description: Described as a visual masterpiece, "Watchtower of Turkey" is praised for its breathtaking cinematography, dynamic soundtrack, and impeccable editing. The film takes viewers through vibrant cities and awe-inspiring landscapes, showcasing the country's remarkable diversity and beauty. It's more than just a travel video; it's a tribute to Turkey's rich culture, history, and natural wonders, crafted with an eye for detail and a knack for storytelling.

Moonlight (2016)
A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood. Directed by Barry Jenkins and shot on an Arri Alexa XT camera.
Technique - Underwater , Water Level
Director - Barry Jenkins
DOP - James Laxton
Editor - Joi McMillon, Nat Sanders
Colorist - Alex Bickel

videos.title: X (2022)
videos.description: Ti West directed thriller in which a group of young filmmakers set out to make an adult film in rural Texas, but when their reclusive, elderly hosts catch them in the act, the cast find themselves fighting for their lives.

videos.title: Watchtower of Turkey (2014)
videos.description: Described as a visual masterpiece, "Watchtower of Turkey" is praised for its breathtaking cinematography, dynamic soundtrack, and impeccable editing. The film takes viewers through vibrant cities and awe-inspiring landscapes, showcasing the country's remarkable diversity and beauty. It's more than just a travel video; it's a tribute to Turkey's rich culture, history, and natural wonders, crafted with an eye for detail and a knack for storytelling.
videos.additional_info:
Watchtower of Turkey (2014)
Described as a visual masterpiece, "Watchtower of Turkey" is praised for its breathtaking cinematography, dynamic soundtrack, and impeccable editing. The film takes viewers through vibrant cities and awe-inspiring landscapes, showcasing the country's remarkable diversity and beauty. It's more than just a travel video; it's a tribute to Turkey's rich culture, history, and natural wonders, crafted with an eye for detail and a knack for storytelling.
Technique - Water Level
Director - Leonardo Dalessandri
